in my research of yoshitsune and the minamoto as a whole - i have so 
far not found any information detailing what number son was 
Yoshitsune born. i know that noriyori is 3 years older - and yoritomo 
12 - but is Yoshitsune the youngest? Was there any elder brothers 
that died in the insurrection/disturbance?

Also - in my readings i have found that it states that yoshitsune and 
yoritomo are half brothers. Is this fact? If so - does this make 
Noriyori Yoshitsunes half brother also?

Any help would be appreciated! Thanx
